root.name: Earache: Extreme Metal Racing
root.description: Earache Extreme Metal Racing is a budget title released by UK based budget developers Data Design Interactive. The games Death Metal soundtrack features artists all signed to the Earache music label.Akercocke (Progressive Black/ Death Metal) Anata (Technical Death Metal) At The Gates (Melodic Death Metal) Beecher (Metal, hardcore punk, and rock) Cathedral (Doom Metal) Cult of Luna (Atmospheric/ Progressive metal) Deicide (Death metal) Hate Eternal (Death Metal) Mistress (Death Metal) Morbid Angel (Death Metal) Municipal Waste (Thrash Metal/ Crossover) Napalm Death (Grindcore/ Death Metal) Severe Torture (Brutal Death Metal) The Berzerker (Industrial death/ grind) The Haunted (Melodic Death Metal) Ultraviolence (Thrash Metal) Urkraft (Melodic Death Metal)
